data.text: Very comfortable hotel, only opened for 3 years. Staff excellent and helpful and friendly. Breakfast also lovely with wide choice and staff will get you most things. Indoor and outdoor pool and clear waters at the beach.  Need a car as although there are a few restaurants and shops nearby it is really out of the way and 30 mins from Bodrum.
data.title: excellent hotel, lovely week break

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your kind review.

As Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum family, we were more than happy to have hosted you at our hotel. We are already looking forward to welcoming you again in the near future.

With our love and regards,
Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum
owner_response.author: Elena Hiora

data.text: Gorgeous hotel and excellent service, well located with a beautiful beach and nice shops and restaurants closeby. The dinner we had at the hotel restaurant was excellent and there is a family run authentic Italian on the main bridge with a terrace that is a must visit. The Minister pub is worthwhile too
data.title: Excellent beach resort

data.text: This hotel radisson is quite new, very remote areas with a little town.peace and quiet . We stay here for 10 days and 9 nights. There’s a lot of things it need to be improved the housekeeping is always forget to replace towel for the floor , face towel. Replacing tea, teaspoons etc, we have to call the reception almost everyday to ask for it. The service for breakfast is nothing special a whole bunch of young guy’s doesn’t know what they’re doing.the pool is tiny we didn’t use it. The beach is a public areas lots of outsider is been using the beach and hardly find a place to sit. The ocean is quite dirty and stones.if your coming in bodrum for the first I highly recommend yalikabak areas. I wouldn’t stay at this hotel again.
data.title: New hotel , remote areas middle of nowhere and  it let you down by the service

Please kindly be assured that your notes have been shared with the related departments for necessary actions to be taken in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back to Radisson Collection Hotel, Bodrum and having the opportunity to remedy ourselves in the near future.

owner_response.author: Elena Hiora

data.text: We stayed here just one night as we couldn’t fly the last day of our holiday. I expected it to be more basic with a lack of facilities but it was the opposite. The rooms are lovely, really well decorated. Lots of food options in and around the hotel. Breakfast was very nice. The only issue is Beach area is strange and not very nice. Dirty water and rocky beach. They have this large green area that could be a lovely pool area. Instead the pool is an after thought, really small and not heated. No good for kids. Surprising given the attention given to the rest of the hotel’s decor.
data.title: Surprisingly nice hotel and good value

data.text:
An excellent hotel with amazing hospitality. The team made us feel like we were part of the family (Thanks to all the staff, especially Melsa front desk). 
There's alot around the hotel grounds (restaurants [Pescinni amazing], supermarket, bakery, cafes, shops, etc.). It is a distance from the city but worth the stay.
data.title: A visit amoung visits, worth the stay.
